name: Baba Yaga (itch) (Sir Elison)
description:
Before John Wick retired, he had to do an Impossible Task, a mission so difficult that failure is pretty much a guarantee. John Wick is a man of focus, commitment, and sheer will, he doesn't want to give up. Not when he is so close to being with the woman he loves. 

In the middle of the job, he gets shot from the back and runs away to a secret hideout. He calls out for help from his trusted allies to help him while he tends to his wounds. Little did he know that he was followed there and multiple enemies are inbound to John’s location. Now his life is in the hands of his allies. It is your job to protect him and make sure he gets out of here alive. 

HOW TO PLAY

  1. "W A S D" movement controls
  2. Left Click to shoot.
  3. Right Click to use melee.
  4. Move your mouse cursor to point where to shoot.
  5. Tap "F" to heal John Wick when you are near him.

MULTIPLAYER - Photon Unity Network
No port forwarding needed.

  1. Enter your name and click log in. No password needed.
  2. Wait for your friend to create a room, your friend's room will be listed at the blue panel. Or press the "Create Room" button to make a room.
  3. Once you or your friend joins the room, you will see the player's name listed at the blue panel.
  4. Click "Start Game" to help John Wick and play the game.

CREDITS - HORSEMAN BANNER

  • Rafael Armando S. Cervantes - 2D Artist
  • Daniel Elison T. Ordoyo - Level Designer
  • Lois Marie R. Luzuriaga - Programmer
  • Raphael C. Abiog - Game Designer
  • Victor Trent E. Combate - Lead Programmer
